content.raw: I agree with your logic about the X asix, however based on simspark's conventions it looks like the sign for the X axis should be flipped as the robot has a -X on its back and a +X when on its front.  If forgot that our agent flips the sign of the Y axis after parsing the data and so your values for the Y axis look correct.
content.html: I agree with your logic about the X asix, however based on simspark's conventions it looks like the sign for the X axis should be flipped as the robot has a -X on its back and a +X when on its front. If forgot that our agent flips the sign of the Y axis after parsing the data and so your values for the Y axis look correct.
